name: CallStar
description:
CallStar operates from a modern facility located in Moncton, NB Canada. Calls are initiated through a state-of-the-art dialer fully compliant with the USA and Canadian telemarketing regulations. With approximately 60 employees, the company has the flexibility to undertake telemarketing campaigns large and small. Over 895 automobile dealers across Canada and the USA are happy customers. Call for numerous references.
We can be an important assistant in your sales process as we generate low-cost quality leads. The company was formed in 2001 and is managed by an experienced, professional management team.
